duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform comprehensive psychiatric evaluations, including mental status, current symptoms, and relevant health histories.
Administer treatment plans according to standardized procedures.
Prescribe psychotropic medications and short-term therapies for mental health conditions.
Provide brief psychotherapeutic interventions and evaluation management services.
Monitor and continuously improve patient outcomes.
Maintain timely and accurate charting of clinical encounters through EMR.
Accurately code clinical encounters with CPT and diagnosis codes.
Establish and maintain positive, professional relationships with patients and colleagues.

education_certification.credential: Board Certified Licensed Psychiatrist in the State of PA, preferred; or will accept a Board Eligible Licensed Psychiatrist, seeking Board Certification.
At least 3-4 years of supervisory/management experience.
